name: Publish_Report_html
description: This task helps you to deploy report result in to Report
helpMarkDown: Upload report to Report using task.
author: dpolania

inputs.name: ReportName
inputs.label: Report Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name to the artifact to be uploaded.

inputs.name: pathReport
inputs.label: Path of the artifact *.html
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the artifact to be uploaded.The path can include one artifact of type using the *.html , *.htm , etc.
